hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Iron Boots#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest
